purpleculture_pinyin:
piāo
to float
держаться на плаву
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 飘)
Pictophonetic: 票 indicates the sound; 風 (wind) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
飄揚 [ piāo yáng ]: to wave; to flutter; to fly
飄盪 [ piāo dàng ]: to drift; to wave; to float on the waves; to flutter in the wind
飄浮 [ piāo fú ]: to float; to hover; also written 漂浮
飄逸 [ piāo yì ]: graceful; elegant; to drift; to float
飄落 [ piāo luò ]: to float down; to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 票 [ piào ] bank note; ticket; vote; a slip of paper
    • 風 [ fēng ] wind; air; customs, manners; news
heisig_chinese_memo: It's hard for birds to flutter in a windstorm so I just tell them to buy a subway ticket.&nbsp
Ru_trainchinese: piāo: (глаг/прил) плавать, парить, развеваться; неустойчивый, слабый; самодовольный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ballot paper (票) in the wind (風) floats
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: People always leave restaurant advertisments with tickets for something free in my door and they flutter when the windstorm comes.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " wind " to the sound of " ticket ". The original meaning is the whirlwind, that is, whirlwind. "Said Wen": "Floating, return to the wind. From the wind, the sound." "Er Ya. "Shi Tian": "Returning the wind is floating." Guo Pu's note: "The whirlwind is also." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Who": "Who is who! Is it the wind? Hu does not come from the north, and Hu does not come from the south?" Mao Chuan: "The wind, the wind that rises." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Fang Ji Chuan": "There is a wind that is more than three feet high. It comes up from the application and turns around in the courtyard. The rest will resume, and it will stop after a long time."

" Gone with the wind " means speed. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. Nine songs. "Da Si Ming": "Let the wind be the pioneer, and make the rain and dust be scattered." Jiang Ji's note: "The wind is the wind." "Lv's Spring and Autumn. Watching the watch: "Although it is easy to sign, although it is difficult to watch, the saint cannot drift away, and everyone is innocent." Gao Luu's note: "Floating, sick."

" Piao " means the wind blows. For example, Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms, "Sit for the eldest son": "I am tired from the cold, and the cool breeze blows my body." Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty, "No guests will come to the night": "The wind and rain shower curtains, bamboo and pine cover the lights. deep."

" Piao " means fluttering and flying. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Rong Zhi": "Floating like a cloud, just as frightening as a dragon." Bei Zhou Yuxin's "Sai Jiang Nan Fu": "When the general goes away, the big tree is floating; the strong man does not return, and the cold wind is bleak." It also refers to floating and floating. For example, King Luo Bin of the Tang Dynasty "Floating Cha": "Floating like a boat, what to do if it's a stalk."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " wind " to the sound of " ticket ". The original meaning is the whirlwind, that is, whirlwind.
humanum_full_description:
從「風」，「票」聲。本義是回旋之風，即旋風。《說文》：「飄，回風也。从風，㶾聲。」《爾雅．釋天》：「迴風為飄。」郭璞注：「旋風也。」如《詩．小雅．何人斯》：「彼何人斯！其為飄風？胡不自北，胡不自南？」毛傳：「飄風，暴起之風。」《三國志．魏書．方伎傳》：「有飄風高三尺餘，從申上來，在庭中幢幢回轉，息以復起，良久乃止。」

　　「飄」表示疾速。如《楚辭．九歌．大司命》：「令飄風兮先驅，使涷雨兮灑塵。」蔣驥注：「飄風，疾風也。」《呂氏春秋．觀表》：「徵雖易，表雖難，聖人則不可以飄矣，眾人則無道至焉。」高誘注：「飄，疾也。」

　　「飄」表示風吹。如如三國魏曹植〈侍大子坐〉：「寒冰辟炎累，涼風飄我身。」唐代白居易〈期宿客不至〉：「風飄雨灑簾帷故，竹映松遮燈火深。」

　　「飄」表示飄動、飛揚。如《世說新語．容止》：「飄如遊雲，矯若驚龍。」北周庾信〈哀江南賦〉：「將軍一去，大樹飄零；壯士不還，寒風蕭瑟。」又指飄浮、浮動。如唐代駱賓王〈浮槎〉：「似舟飄不定，如梗泛何從。」
humanum_short_description: 從「風」，「票」聲。本義是回旋之風，即旋風。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
飄 (Simplified: 飘)
Pinyin: piāo
English Definition: to float
Total strokes: 20; Radical: 風
Pictophonetic: 票 indicates the sound; 風 (wind) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 票 [ piào ] bank note; ticket; vote; a slip of paper
    • 風 [ fēng ] wind; air; customs, manners; news
Example Words:
飄揚 [ piāo yáng ]: to wave; to flutter; to fly
飄盪 [ piāo dàng ]: to drift; to wave; to float on the waves; to flutter in the wind
飄浮 [ piāo fú ]: to float; to hover; also written 漂浮
飄逸 [ piāo yì ]: graceful; elegant; to drift; to float
飄落 [ piāo luò ]: to float down; to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
More: 飄* | *飄 | *飄*

從「 風 」，「 票 」聲。本義是回旋之風，即旋風。《說文》：「飄，回風也。从風，㶾聲。」《爾雅．釋天》：「迴風為飄。」郭璞注：「旋風也。」如《詩．小雅．何人斯》：「彼何人斯！其為飄風？胡不自北，胡不自南？」毛傳：「飄風，暴起之風。」《三國志．魏書．方伎傳》：「有飄風高三尺餘，從申上來，在庭中幢幢回轉，息以復起，良久乃止。」 「 飄 」表示疾速。如《楚辭．九歌．大司命》：「令飄風兮先驅，使涷雨兮灑塵。」蔣驥注：「飄風，疾風也。」《呂氏春秋．觀表》：「徵雖易，表雖難，聖人則不可以飄矣，眾人則無道至焉。」高誘注：「飄，疾也。」 「 飄 」表示風吹。如如三國魏曹植〈侍大子坐〉：「寒冰辟炎累，涼風飄我身。」唐代白居易〈期宿客不至〉：「風飄雨灑簾帷故，竹映松遮燈火深。」 「 飄 」表示飄動、飛揚。如《世說新語．容止》：「飄如遊雲，矯若驚龍。」北周庾信〈哀江南賦〉：「將軍一去，大樹飄零；壯士不還，寒風蕭瑟。」又指飄浮、浮動。如唐代駱賓王〈浮槎〉：「似舟飄不定，如梗泛何從。」
